summary: This document is an email chain from April 29-30, 2021, regarding a Reuters reporter's inquiry about a letter discussing an apparent bruise around Ghislaine Maxwell's left eye. The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) declined to comment on the inquiry.

persons.name: Jonathan Stempel
persons.context: A Reuters correspondent in New York who sent an inquiry to the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding a letter about Ghislaine Maxwell's confinement conditions and an apparent bruise around her left eye.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the reporter's inquiry; a letter discussed an apparent bruise around her left eye while she was in confinement at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

events.title: Reuters Inquiry About Maxwell's Bruise
events.description: Reuters reporter Jonathan Stempel sends an inquiry to the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding a letter that discusses an apparent bruise around Ghislaine Maxwell's left eye, asking for comment on the letter, the timing and origin of the bruise, and what is being done about it.

events.title: Lawyer Files Communication on Confinement
events.description: A lawyer for the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) files a communication regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's confinement conditions.

events.title: SDNY Declines Comment on Maxwell Inquiry
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) declines to comment on Reuters reporter Jonathan Stempel's inquiry about the letter concerning Ghislaine Maxwell's bruise.

keyFacts: A Reuters reporter inquired about a letter discussing an apparent bruise around Ghislaine Maxwell's left eye while she was in confinement.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) declined to comment on the inquiry.
Communications regarding Maxwell's confinement conditions were noted to be coming from multiple sources, including a lawyer for the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
